description: Full-time Student, US Citizen, Finance or Accounting major, must have completed 45+ hours, minimum 3.0 GPA, preference given to students who are active in campus clubs/extracurricular activities, financial need considered Eligibility Requirements Finance or Accounting major Must have completed 45+ hours Minimum GPA of 3.0 Selection Process Preference is given to students who are active in campus clubs/extracurricular activities Financial need considered
